name: Bryndaor's Might
description: Death Strike refunds 15% of Runic Power spent if it heals you for more than 10% of your maximum health.

name: Crimson Rune Weapon
description: When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 3 sec. Additionally, when Dancing Rune Weapon fades, your Rune regeneration rate is increased by 40% for 10 sec.

name: Vampiric Aura
description: Your Vampiric Blood ability also affects all party members for 50% of the effect it has on you.

name: Gorefiend's Domination
description: Heart Strike reduces the remaining cooldown on Vampiric Blood by 2 seconds.

name: Koltira's Favor
description: Obliterate deals 10% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.

name: Biting Cold
description: Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 15%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.

name: Absolute Zero
description: Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.

name: Grip of the Everlasting
description: For 3 sec after casting Death Grip, you may cast the spell a second time without regard for its cooldown.

name: Death's Embrace
description: Increases the duration of Anti-Magic Shell by 100% and any damage it absorbs heals you.

name: Reanimated Shambler
description: Your attacks have a chance to summon a Super Zombie that shambles forward and explodes, dealing (124% of Attack power) Shadow damage and applying a Festering Wound to 8 nearby enemies.

name: Frenzied Monstrosity
description: Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 20%.

name: Death's Certainty
description:
Death Strike and Death Coil deal 10% increased damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of 

<condition>Defile</condition>
<dynamic>Defile</dynamic>

Death and Decay by 2.0 sec.

name: Deadliest Coil
description: Reduces the Runic Power cost of Death Coil by 10 and Death Coil increases the duration of Dark Transformation by 2 sec.

name: Superstrain
description: Your Frost Fever, Blood Plague, and Virulent Plague also apply the other two diseases at reduced effectiveness.

name: Phearomones
description: You and your minions gain 10% Haste while you are inside your Death and Decay and enemies damaged by your Death and Decay have a chance to cower in place for 3 sec.

name: Rage of the Frozen Champion
description: Obliterate has a 15% increased chance to trigger Rime and Howling Blast generates 8 Runic Power while Rime is active.
